A

actor - package actor
 
Actor - Class in actor
The Actor class is the super class for all different types of Actor subclasses.
Actor(int, Army) - Constructor for class actor.Actor
Actor constructor is used when building Actor objects automatically: strength, health, speed fields are given randomly generated values within their range; name is given a sequentially numbered name: Auto:n where n is the sequence number.
ActorFactory - Class in actor
class ActorFactory is a wrapper class that encapsulates tools needed for the automated generation of Actor subclass objects.
ActorFactory() - Constructor for class actor.ActorFactory
 
ActorFactory.Type - Enum in actor
An enum type is a special data type that enables for a variable to be a set of predefined constants.
actorSerialNumber - Static variable in class actor.Actor
static variable used to embed sequence number in Actor names; because it is static, there is one-and-only-one instance of this variable regardless of the number of Actor objects in existence (from none to infinity).
adjustHealth(double) - Method in class actor.Actor
applies changeToValue to the health attribute.
army - package army
 
Army - Class in army
Army class manages a collection of Actor objects.
Army(String, Simulator, Color) - Constructor for class army.Army
Constructor builds an Army object
armyAllegiance - Variable in class actor.Actor
Used to assist in finding nearest opposing Actor; this ActorArmy search the opposing Army, thus the Army will need to know who the opposing Army is, but that's the Army responsibility.
ArmyTest - Class in test
Simple class to test behaviour of Army and Actor classes.
ArmyTest() - Constructor for class test.ArmyTest
 
avatar - Variable in class actor.Elf
This subclass of Actor defines its own unique avatar, which can be ANY kind of Node, but for Elf it will be Rectangle.
avatar - Variable in class actor.Hobbit
This subclass of Actor defines its own unique avatar, which can be ANY kind of Node, but for Hobbit it will be Circle.
avatar - Variable in class actor.Orc
This subclass of Actor defines its own unique avatar, which can be ANY kind of Node, but for Orc it will be Rectangle.
avatar - Variable in class actor.Wizard
This subclass of Actor defines its own unique avatar, which can be ANY kind of Node, but for Wizard it will be ImageView based on a .GIF file that has an animated image of a wizard.
